moves.name: Ominous Wind
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Dance with Me!
moves.effect: Increases the user’s move gauge by three. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

passives.name: Backfire 2
passives.description: Sharply lowers the Attack and Sp. Atk of all opposing sync pairs just before the user faints.

passives.name: Bulk Buster 4
passives.description: The more HP the target has, the more it powers up moves.
